certifications.name: GIAC Exploit Researcher and Advanced Penetration Tester (GXPN)

projects.title: Development of an all-in-one IPv6 Pen testing framework
projects.description:
I am developing an all-in-one IPv6 Pen Testing Framework, which will include at least the following capabilities:
- IPv6 Scanning techniques
- IPv6 Extension Headers Fuzzing
- Creation of Arbitrary IPv6 Neighbor Discovery Messages
- Several IPv6 attacks
- IDS / IPS capabilities
This project was supported by the Brucon 5x5 program and presented in Brucon, in September of 2014.

contributors.headline: Head of Systems Security Engineering Section at European Space Agency - ESA

projects.title: RISC: Researching IPv6 Security Capabilities
projects.description:
This is a collaborative project with the guys of the ERNW.de security company. The goals of the project is to test some representative IPv6 security COMMERCIAL devices regarding:
- Their IPv6 Security Capabilities.
- The IPv6 security-related configuration capabilities that they offer.
- Their RFC-compliance.
Security devices are tested from the following categories:
-Firewalls
-IDS/IPS
-High-End layer-2 switches with IPv6 Security Capabilities.
Initial results (and ...vulnerabilities) will be presented at the upcoming IPv6 Security summit at Troopers 14.

contributors.headline: Head of Systems Security Engineering Section at European Space Agency - ESA

projects.title: Development of a Customised, Especially Hardened VPN Device for Connecting Remote Sites
projects.description: Special, low-cost but highly-secured (hardened) VPN devices were developed for using them for remote connections.

contributors.headline: Head of Systems Security Engineering Section at European Space Agency - ESA

projects.title: Design and deployment of a Defense-In-Depth Strategy for the Classified Network
projects.description: Design of the topology, deployment and configuration of Network Perimeter Security Devices for the Classified Network, like firewalls and IPS, as well as enterprise platforms for HIDS/Antivirus.

contributors.headline: Head of Systems Security Engineering Section at European Space Agency - ESA

projects.title: Design and deployment of a PKI System
projects.description: Design and deployment of a PKI system for an internal network used for various purposes, but mainly for digitally signing electronic documents using USB tokens

contributors.headline: Head of Systems Security Engineering Section at European Space Agency - ESA

projects.title: Design and organising of the Required IT / Telecom Infrastructure to Support the 1st International Air Show in Greece
projects.description:
Design and organising of the all the required IT / Telecom Infrastructure to Support the 1st International Air Show in Greece "Archangel 2005". This included (but not limited to):
- Backbone Infrastructure
- Ground-to-Ground wireless communication
- Ground-to-Air communication
- IT infrastructure (Internet connections, LANs, etc).
- Enhance of the local cellular networks capabilities

contributors.headline: Head of Systems Security Engineering Section at European Space Agency - ESA

projects.title: A Comparative Study of Cryptographic Solutions for backbone Networks
projects.description: All the possible solutions were examined and compared regarding the encryption of communication for a backbone WAN network. This study included both link-encryption solutions and IP-encryprion ones.

company.name: NATO Communications and Information Agency (NCI Agency)

profile_positions.company: NATO Communications and Information Agency (NCI Agency)
profile_positions.title: Cyber Security Scientist

profile_positions.description: Responsible for guiding and advising authors of GIAC Gold papers on both technical and writing issues, grading the papers of the authors that I supervise and reviewing papers of other candidates.
profile_positions.title: SANS Giac Gold Adviser

profile_positions.location: ERNW.de / Hellenic Air Force NCO Academy
profile_positions.description: Instructor in various Public and Hellenic Air Force Schools in the fields of Telecommunications and Computer Science. I currently teach at Hellenic Air Force NCO Academy Computer Networks and C Programming. Moreover, I often give IPv6 Advanced Pentesting workshops organised by the German security company ERNW and their partner HM Training Solutions.
profile_positions.title: Instructor

profile_positions.description: During my whole career as an IT/Telecommunications Engineer of Hellenic Air Force, I served as an Officer in several related positions, from an IT/Telecom Staff Officer of the Hellenic Tactical Air Force Headquarters to Chief of the Data Handling and CIS Office at various Units. During my services,  I also participated  and managed several IT/Telecom related projects, either national or NATO ones.
profile_positions.title: Telecom - IT Engineer / Hellenic Air Force

profile_positions.description: Exam Development and auditing (on demand) for GWEB, GCIH, GCIA, GREM, CXPN, GSEC GIAC Security Certifications.
profile_positions.title: Contractor

profile_positions.description:
Management of the technician personnel of IT Centre of the Unit, which is responsible for:
- Administrating all the classified network, systems and applications of Hellenic National Defence General Staff, from layer 1 to layer 7, both National and NATO ones.
- Securing them including network security, host security and users' security awareness.
- Deploying new devices, servers or systems when needed.
profile_positions.title: Chief of the Information Technology Centre of the CIS Battalion

profile_positions.location: Hellenic National Defense General Staff/ CIS Directorate
profile_positions.description:
Team leader, responsible for the protection of the Classified Systems of the Hellenic National Defence General Staff.
Administration of all Network and Host IPS, Firewalls, WAFs, antivirus, etc.
Enforcing security policies for the classified network and systems of the HNDGS.
profile_positions.title: Chief IT Security Engineer, Intrusion Analyst

profile_positions.description: I have participated in several Cyber Defense Exercises, international (NCDEx'09, NCDEx'10, NCDEx'11) and national (Panoptis 2010) ones, either as a member of the Read Team or as a National Exercise Controller.
profile_positions.title: Organiser/Red-Team in Cyber Defense Exercises

company.name: Cyber Defense Directorate of Hellenic National Defense General Staff

profile_positions.company: Cyber Defense Directorate of Hellenic National Defense General Staff
profile_positions.description:
Handling Cyber-Defense and IT Security Incidents in the scope of Hellenic National Defence General Staff and in the Greek Armed Forces.
Testing IDS, Network and Host Perimeter Protection and SIEM systems, designing and proposing network perimeter protection architectures and deploying them.
Proposing preventive and reactive security measures and policies.
profile_positions.title: Incident Handler / Penetration Tester / Intrusion Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Project management of several Telecommunications projects of Hellenic Air Force, specialised in cryptographic projects (related with architecture, equipment and procedures) and backbone networks.
Holder of National and NATO Security Clearance. 
I also participated and managed several NATO and national IT/Telecom projects and participate as a National representative to various Working Groups like the NATO Tactical Data Link Working Group (DLWG).
profile_positions.title: Crypto-security Officer - IT Staff Officer / Hellenic Air Force Generall Staff
